name: respec-given-lab
description: given syntax on top of lab testing framework

scripts.link: rm -rf node_modules/respec-given-lab && mkdir -p node_modules/respec-given-lab && cd node_modules/respec-given-lab && ln -s ../../package.json package.json && ln -s ../../index.js index.js && ln -s ../../lib lib && ln -s ../../mocha mocha && cd -
